table.name: TBBA_BOARD_MANAGER
table.creation: CREATE TABLE TBBA_BOARD_MANAGER ( BOARD_CODE varchar(20) NOT NULL, NAME varchar(50) NOT NULL, HEAD text, TAIL text, UPLOAD_LIMIT int NOT NULL, EXP_COUNT int NOT NULL, LEVEL_SET varchar(5) NOT NULL, REPLY_F varchar(1) NOT NULL, COMMENT_F varchar(1) NOT NULL, PDS_F varchar(1) NOT NULL, ENCODE_F varchar(1) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (BOARD_CODE) )

table.name: TBBB_BOARD_ARTICLE
table.creation: CREATE TABLE TBBB_BOARD_ARTICLE ( ARTICLE_SEQ int NOT NULL, BOARD_CODE varchar(20) NOT NULL, MEMBER_ID varchar(20), IDX1 int NOT NULL, IDX2 int NOT NULL, IDX3 int NOT NULL, DEPTH_LEVEL int NOT NULL, TITLE varchar(200) NOT NULL, NAME varchar(50) NOT NULL, EMAIL varchar(100), PASSWD varchar(10), CONTENT text NOT NULL, IP varchar(20) NOT NULL, HIT_COUNT int NOT NULL, ENCODE_F varchar(1) NOT NULL, REG_DATE datetime NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (ARTICLE_SEQ) )

defaultValue.query: ALTER TABLE TBBB_BOARD_ARTICLE ADD FOREIGN KEY (BOARD_CODE) REFERENCES TBBA_BOARD_MANAGER(BOARD_CODE)

table.name: TBBC_BOARD_COMMENT
table.creation: CREATE TABLE TBBC_BOARD_COMMENT ( COMMENT_SEQ int NOT NULL, ARTICLE_SEQ int NOT NULL, MEMBER_ID varchar(20) NULL, NAME varchar(50) NOT NULL, PASSWD varchar(10) NULL, CONTENT text NOT NULL, IP varchar(20) NOT NULL, REG_DATE datetime NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (COMMENT_SEQ) )

defaultValue.query: ALTER TABLE TBBC_BOARD_COMMENT ADD FOREIGN KEY (ARTICLE_SEQ) REFERENCES TBBB_BOARD_ARTICLE(ARTICLE_SEQ)

table.name: TBBD_BOARD_FILE
table.creation: CREATE TABLE TBBD_BOARD_FILE ( FILE_SEQ int NOT NULL, ARTICLE_SEQ int NOT NULL, ORIGINAL_NAME varchar(250) NOT NULL, SAVE_NAME varchar(250) NOT NULL, SIZE int NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (FILE_SEQ) )

defaultValue.query: ALTER TABLE TBBD_BOARD_FILE ADD FOREIGN KEY (ARTICLE_SEQ) REFERENCES TBBB_BOARD_ARTICLE(ARTICLE_SEQ)

table.name: TBZZ_MEMO
table.creation: CREATE TABLE TBZZ_MEMO ( MEMO_NO INTEGER NOT NULL, TITLE VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (MEMO_NO) )
